SummaryEnglish: In the chaotic world, evil spirits are rampant and traitors are in power. When the Nether Realm invaded again, the forces of the human and Nether realms were poisoning the world. Xu Ying, the snake catcher, couldn't stand the grass-headed god who worked for the Nether Realm oppressing the people, so he resisted and committed the crime of killing gods and killed the imperial court for inaction. Official, hunted by forces from both worlds, started a career on the run...
Aliases: Choose a good day to become an Immortal
